unnormalised: Breaking news from the world of Indian startups! Ms. Priya Sharma has just been appointed as the new CEO of "Desi Bites," a rapidly growing food delivery app. The announcement came earlier today, and the buzz is already building.
normalised: Breaking news from the world of Indian startups! Missus Priya Sharma has just been appointed as the new C-E-O of "Desi Bites," a rapidly growing food delivery app. The announcement came earlier today, and the buzz is already building.

unnormalised: Sources say Ms. Sharma, previously the VP of Marketing at a competing firm, brings a wealth of experience to Desi Bites. Her track record includes launching several successful campaigns that significantly boosted brand visibility. She holds an MBA from IIM Ahmedabad and is known for her innovative strategies.
normalised: Sources say Missus Sharma, previously the V-P of Marketing at a competing firm, brings a wealth of experience to Desi Bites. Her track record includes launching several successful campaigns that significantly boosted brand visibility. She holds an M-B-A from I-I-M Ahmedabad and is known for her innovative strategies.

unnormalised: The outgoing CEO, Mr. Rakesh Kumar, is reportedly moving on to pursue personal ventures. We wish him all the best and eagerly await Ms. Sharma's vision for Desi Bites! Can't wait to see what changes she brings, especially with the competition heating up in the Indian food-tech scene!
normalised: The outgoing C-E-O, Mister Rakesh Kumar, is reportedly moving on to pursue personal ventures. We wish him all the best and eagerly await Missus Sharma's vision for Desi Bites! Can't wait to see what changes she brings, especially with the competition heating up in the Indian food-tech scene!
